# BlazyUI

> A Blazor component library wrapping DaisyUI v5 with Tailwind CSS v4. Provides 34+ strongly-typed components with full IntelliSense, EditForm validation integration, TailwindMerge for class conflict resolution, and programmatic Modal/Toast services.

## Documentation

- [README](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/ogix/BlazyUI/refs/heads/main/README.md): Installation guide, usage examples, and component overview
- [CLAUDE.md](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/ogix/BlazyUI/refs/heads/main/CLAUDE.md): AI instructions, architecture details, and development patterns

## Core Architecture

- [BlazyComponentBase](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/ogix/BlazyUI/refs/heads/main/src/BlazyUI/Components/BlazyComponentBase.cs): Base class for non-input components (TwMerge, Class parameter, AdditionalAttributes)
- [BlazyInputBase](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/ogix/BlazyUI/refs/heads/main/src/BlazyUI/Components/BlazyInputBase.cs): Base class for form inputs (EditForm validation, error styling)
- [ExpressionFormatter](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/ogix/BlazyUI/refs/heads/main/src/BlazyUI/Components/ExpressionFormatter.cs): Expression-based field name generation for form inputs
- [FieldIdGenerator](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/ogix/BlazyUI/refs/heads/main/src/BlazyUI/Components/FieldIdGenerator.cs): Generates unique field IDs from expressions

## Services

- [IModalService](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/ogix/BlazyUI/refs/heads/main/src/BlazyUI/Components/Modal/IModalService.cs): Modal dialog API (Show, Confirm, Alert methods)
- [IToastService](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/ogix/BlazyUI/refs/heads/main/src/BlazyUI/Components/Toast/IToastService.cs): Toast notification API (Success, Error, Info, Warning)
- [ServiceCollectionExtensions](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/ogix/BlazyUI/refs/heads/main/src/BlazyUI/Extensions/ServiceCollectionExtensions.cs): AddBlazyUI() service registration

## Components - Layout

- [Accordion](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/ogix/BlazyUI/refs/heads/main/src/BlazyUI/Components/Accordion/Accordion.razor): Collapsible content sections with expandable panels
- [Card](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/ogix/BlazyUI/refs/heads/main/src/BlazyUI/Components/Card/Card.razor): Container with header, body, and action sections
- [Collapse](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/ogix/BlazyUI/refs/heads/main/src/BlazyUI/Components/Collapse/Collapse.razor): Single collapsible panel for show/hide content
- [Divider](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/ogix/BlazyUI/refs/heads/main/src/BlazyUI/Components/Divider/Divider.razor): Visual separator between content sections
- [Drawer](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/ogix/BlazyUI/refs/heads/main/src/BlazyUI/Components/Drawer/Drawer.razor): Off-canvas sidebar navigation panel
- [Join](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/ogix/BlazyUI/refs/heads/main/src/BlazyUI/Components/Join/Join.razor): Group elements together with connected styling
- [NavBar](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/ogix/BlazyUI/refs/heads/main/src/BlazyUI/Components/NavBar/NavBar.razor): Top navigation bar with responsive layout
- [Tabs](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/ogix/BlazyUI/refs/heads/main/src/BlazyUI/Components/Tabs/Tabs.razor): Tabbed content panels with multiple styles
- [Timeline](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/ogix/BlazyUI/refs/heads/main/src/BlazyUI/Components/Timeline/Timeline.razor): Chronological event display


## Components - Form Inputs

- [Checkbox](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/ogix/BlazyUI/refs/heads/main/src/BlazyUI/Components/Checkbox/Checkbox.razor): Boolean input for forms with validation support
- [DateInput](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/ogix/BlazyUI/refs/heads/main/src/BlazyUI/Components/DateInput/DateInput.razor): Date/time input supporting DateTime, DateOnly, TimeOnly types
- [Fieldset](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/ogix/BlazyUI/refs/heads/main/src/BlazyUI/Components/Fieldset/Fieldset.razor): Form field grouping with legend support
- [FieldValidator](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/ogix/BlazyUI/refs/heads/main/src/BlazyUI/Components/FieldValidator/FieldValidator.razor): Validation message display for form fields
- [FileInput](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/ogix/BlazyUI/refs/heads/main/src/BlazyUI/Components/FileInput/FileInput.razor): File upload input with drag-and-drop
- [FormField](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/ogix/BlazyUI/refs/heads/main/src/BlazyUI/Components/FormField/FormField.razor): Complete form field with label, input, and validation
- [Label](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/ogix/BlazyUI/refs/heads/main/src/BlazyUI/Components/Label/Label.razor): Form field labels with required indicator
- [Radio](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/ogix/BlazyUI/refs/heads/main/src/BlazyUI/Components/Radio/Radio.razor): Single selection from radio button options
- [Range](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/ogix/BlazyUI/refs/heads/main/src/BlazyUI/Components/Range/Range.razor): Slider input for numeric range selection
- [Rating](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/ogix/BlazyUI/refs/heads/main/src/BlazyUI/Components/Rating/Rating.razor): Star rating input component
- [Select](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/ogix/BlazyUI/refs/heads/main/src/BlazyUI/Components/Select/Select.razor): Dropdown selection with validation support
- [Textarea](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/ogix/BlazyUI/refs/heads/main/src/BlazyUI/Components/Textarea/Textarea.razor): Multi-line text input with validation
- [TextInput](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/ogix/BlazyUI/refs/heads/main/src/BlazyUI/Components/TextInput/TextInput.razor): Text, email, password inputs with validation
- [Toggle](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/ogix/BlazyUI/refs/heads/main/src/BlazyUI/Components/Toggle/Toggle.razor): Switch/toggle input for boolean values


## Components - Visual/Feedback

- [Alert](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/ogix/BlazyUI/refs/heads/main/src/BlazyUI/Components/Alert/Alert.razor): Contextual feedback messages with color variants
- [Badge](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/ogix/BlazyUI/refs/heads/main/src/BlazyUI/Components/Badge/Badge.razor): Small status indicators and labels
- [Button](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/ogix/BlazyUI/refs/heads/main/src/BlazyUI/Components/Button/Button.razor): Interactive buttons with colors, sizes, and states
- [Indicator](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/ogix/BlazyUI/refs/heads/main/src/BlazyUI/Components/Indicator/Indicator.razor): Notification badge overlay for elements
- [Kbd](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/ogix/BlazyUI/refs/heads/main/src/BlazyUI/Components/Kbd/Kbd.razor): Keyboard key styling for shortcuts
- [Loading](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/ogix/BlazyUI/refs/heads/main/src/BlazyUI/Components/Loading/Loading.razor): Loading spinners and skeleton animations
- [Progress](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/ogix/BlazyUI/refs/heads/main/src/BlazyUI/Components/Progress/Progress.razor): Progress bars with value indication
- [Skeleton](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/ogix/BlazyUI/refs/heads/main/src/BlazyUI/Components/Skeleton/Skeleton.razor): Loading placeholder animations
- [Stat](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/ogix/BlazyUI/refs/heads/main/src/BlazyUI/Components/Stat/Stat.razor): Statistical displays with title and value
- [Status](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/ogix/BlazyUI/refs/heads/main/src/BlazyUI/Components/Status/Status.razor): Status dot indicators
- [Tooltip](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/ogix/BlazyUI/refs/heads/main/src/BlazyUI/Components/Tooltip/Tooltip.razor): Hover information tooltips


## Components - Dialogs/Overlays

- [Modal](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/ogix/BlazyUI/refs/heads/main/src/BlazyUI/Components/Modal/Modal.razor): Dialog windows via IModalService
- [Toast](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/ogix/BlazyUI/refs/heads/main/src/BlazyUI/Components/Toast/Toast.razor): Toast notifications via IToastService


## Components - Navigation

- [Menu](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/ogix/BlazyUI/refs/heads/main/src/BlazyUI/Components/Menu/Menu.razor): Vertical menu with items and nested dropdowns


## Components - Other

- [NumberInput](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/ogix/BlazyUI/refs/heads/main/src/BlazyUI/Components/NumberInput/NumberInput.razor): UI component
